thumb.title: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Promise of a Flower: Approach | AVPUNKNOWN
thumb.description: As we push deeper into the heart of the pathogen hive, an eerie presence looms over us. The air is thick with corruption, the walls pulsing with an unnatural life. Something is here… something wrong. The swarm is endless an unstoppable tide of horrors unlike anything we've faced before... these are not xenomorphs... these are parasites a pathogen of sorts abomination! But we're Marines. We do not falter. We do not break. Lock and load it's time to uncover the truth. Move out! Big thx/shoutout to my pal @b1kingkenny for providing great technical and fire support! go check his channel out for Aliens | Predator | AVP Game Content! Alright sweethearts, you heard the man! And you know the drill, assholes and elbows! Buy Aliens: Fireteam Elite (STEAM/PC) https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549970/Aliens_Fireteam_Elite/
